title: Two Loos
body: Two Loos is an RSVP system build in AS3 for Steven & Christine Loo's wedding. They entered all their invites into a MySQL database and the system queries the name and gives all addresses for that name. Administration backend to view all rsvp. Site design by Alex Udarbe. Back-end development by Justin Lopez.
field_tags: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Animate, Actionscript 3.0, XML, PHP, MySQL

title: Future Solutions, inc.
body: Future Solutions, inc. is a duplication house from anything from floppy discs to solid state memory. I rebranded, designed, developed, animated, and database designed this site. Has useful functions like AJAX forms. All content is dynamic. News has an RSS feed. Back-end development by Justin Lopez.

title: Social Task
body: Designed and developed a band site for Social Task 1979. In charge of all their social media and PR. Shot dozens of stills/video shows and PR shots. Designed countless fliers and many of the album art.

title: TW Tinting
body: TW Tinting is a tinting shop in Santa Ana, CA. I developed an identity package for them.

title: BaccHus Development
body: BaccHus Dev is an Irvine based commercial real estate developer. I built a base framework for it and assisted the lead developer. I was in charge of building a cart like system for properties companies are interested in. It builds a portfolio for the user and when the user is ready they can submit it and BaccHus will contact them with their portfolio information. Lead Developer John Cho. Site designed by Alex Udarbe. Also developed by Kyle Cummings.

title: Farhad Samari
body: Farhad Samari is a fashion & on location photographer. I designed and developed the flash system. Simple and basic. Easy to make changes through the XML file. Thumbnails have a nice animation in and out. Built a primitive music player with mute function.

title: Sage - Presentation Builder
body: Sage Presentation Builder is based off Sage's Solution Explorer. You are able to create custom presentations with flv, swf, image, or pdf. You are able to save and load your presentation into xml format and share with others. I developed it into Zinc 2.5. Deployment was CD. Design by Alex Udarbe.

title: Sage - Genius
body: Sage Genius was a PURL mailer campaign that lasted 16weeks. It was a game to win sage giveaways. And to entice the clients to buy other Sage Software products. I developed the template and content areas. All data was stored in a database. Site designed by Alex Udarbe. Back-end development by Kyle Cummings.

title: Atelier G
body: Atelier G is a photographer based in Irvine, CA. I developed a simple identity package.

title: Nayeb Software
body: Nayeb Software is an independent software company based in Irvine, CA. I developed a simple identity package.

title: Rite Address
body: Brand package for a new software company that addresses email validation

title: EVA
body: Eva is a 24/7 live assistant service. Developed the template system and modules in HTML & CSS. Developed the navigation with dynamically loaded images in flash. Also made a version with a rotating slide show. Used a page turning component to build their digital press kit. Site designed by Alex Udarbe. Also developed by John Cho.

title: M2G Media
body: M2G Media is a video production company based in Irvine, CA. I developed this site in flash with multiple galleries for video and images. Dynamic changing background with page. All XML driven. Wasn't fully developed and deployed. Site design by Alex Udarbe.

title: BioVision
body: BioVision is a Swiss based company with a new vision restoration procedure. I was assigned to develop the template and modules in HTML & CSS and make sure they validate. Site designed by Alex Udarbe. Back-end development by Houshang Houseni.

title: Matthew McConaughey
body: Matthew McConaughey and his production company j.k. Livin needed a site revamp with a forum. I was in charge of getting the design from illustrator and imagery exported from photoshop into flash pages with the most manageable and efficient placement. I also was in charge of developing the j.k. Livin section. I also did some motion design. Site design by Raphael. Lead developer and back-end development by Kyle Cummings.

title: Absolute Movers & More
body: Absolute Movers & More is an Orange County based moving company. I developed an Identity package for them. Designed and Developed their website. Dynamic XML driven navigation with suddle animation. Used easy AJAX forms. Database driven testimonials.
field_tags: HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX, XML, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop

title: Sage - Solutions Explorer
body: Sage Solutions Explorer was the highest ROI project I've ever worked on. They sent out a mailer to notify existing customers to expand on their existing software. I supervised the video shoot. Chroma keyed the talent in After Effects. Fully developed the flash system and folder module. It also tracks your video settings and last page you were on through cookies. When the folder is submitted it creates lead generation to Sage's sales team. Site designed by Alex Udarbe. Video production by M2G media.

title: Sage – Sage360
body: Sage 360 was a campaign to educate their customers on how their products could improve their business. I designed and produced this motion graphics piece in After Effects. This piece was deployed to sage360.com and authored to DVD and opened for Sage's CEO at a seminar.

title: Sage – Summit
body: Sage Summit is a huge conference Sage Software hold every year. I built the original Solutions Explorer as a kiosk. I also built a simple screen saver for all their kiosk machines. The kiosks reset after a few minutes of inactivity. This project lead into Sage 360 and the online Solutions Explorer. Designed by Alex Udarbe and I.

title: All Deck
body: All Deck is a decking compound company based in Laguna Beach, CA. I shot video clips of different techniques on repairing your deck. Ultimately it was an instructional promotional video. I built the DVD intro in Cinema 4D and After Effects and authored in Encore. Directed by Ed Chavez.

title: Tony Hawk's 900
body: This project was dedicated  to Tony Hawks infamous 900 spin during competition in San Francisco in 1999 during X-Games X. Its basically an informational site to give you the Who What When Where and Why. I designed and developed this site.

title: Luscious Lashes
body: Logo and post design for a long time company who never had any solid branding for their eye lash business.

title: Ramco Dealer Service
body: RDS is an independent special automotive services company based in Orange County. I developed an identity package, and developed a microsite.
field_tags: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Dreamweaver, Adobe Animate
